item.title: Korie add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "You're the strangest person I ever met, she said & I said you too & we decided we'd know each other a long time." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Korie add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "Anyone can slay a dragon ...but try waking up every morning and loving the world all over again. That's what takes a real hero." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Korie add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "I saw them standing there pretending to be just friends, when all the time in the world could not pry them apart. " -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Korie add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "Time stands still best in moments that look suspiciously like ordinary life." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Korie add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "Most people don't know there are angels whose only job is to make sure you don't get too comfortable & fall asleep & miss your life. " -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Korie add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "He loved her for almost everything she was & she decided that was enough to let him stay for a very long time." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Korie add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "There was a single blue line of crayon drawn across every wall in the house. What does it mean? I asked. A pirate needs the sight of the sea, he said and then he pulled his eye patch down and turned and sailed away." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Korie add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "There are lives I can imagine without children but none of them have the same laughter & noise." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Korie add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "I didn't listen to her because she was my mother & wouldn't know anything until I was much older." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Korie add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "I used to believe my father about everything but then I had children myself & now I see how much stuff you make up just to keep yourself from going crazy." -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Korie add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Korie add a quote by Fannie Flagg
item.description: "Remember if people talk behind your back, it only means you are two steps ahead." -- Fannie Flagg
